Note:

  1. Please go through the instructions to tenders and terms and conditions and quote in accordance with the same.
  2. Quotations should be sent in duplicate (Technical and commercial part separately) in sealed envelopes superscribing enquiry number, due date, date and time of opening so as to reach us on or before the last date of receipt of tender.
  3. Late tenders will not be considered under any circumstances including postal delays.
